AboutMe.title: About
AboutMe.shortDescription: I am a computer science student and a technology enthusiast. I combine academic knowledge with hands-on experience in systems administration and web development.

page.subtitle: Student & Developer
page.p1: Hi, my name is <b1>{name}</b1>. I am a second-year Computer Science student at <blue>{school}</blue> in Legnica.
page.p2: My interests cover a wide range of IT fields, with a particular focus on <b2>{focus}</b2>. I am also developing my skills in Fullstack Development, as demonstrated by this portfolio.
page.p3: I gained professional experience during my internship at <b2>{company}</b2>, where I was responsible for network and server administration and served as a Help Desk specialist. This allowed me to develop both technical and soft skills.
page.p4: In my spare time, I explore Linux systems and <purple>{iot}</purple>, working with Raspberry Pi, Arduino, and ESP.
page.mobilePreview: PDF preview is optimized for desktop devices.
